note:
Socialist, defender of freedom of expression for those who defend freedom of expression, often grumpy and sarcastic. New here after a decade with the bird, I’ll get the hang of it. “Boosting” “Reblogging” doesn’t imply agreement, it says something is worth discussing or being aware of. Or it’s just cute.
Pfp is a troubled boiler. Wallpaper is approximate rate of ice growth in fresh water. Water has always fascinated me.
